entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 12 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:37 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
